NewsArticle.Title: Updates
NewsArticle.Content: Updates - Skills/Spells Updates * Increased Damage to Mad Soul, first time was insignificant * Increased Damage to Double Rake 1-7 * MSPG is 1 Line Cast again * Lowered Cool-down for Mass Strike 1-9 -Hunting Area Updates * Increased Experience/Ability Points in Cursed Home * Increased Experience/Ability Points in Desert Dunes * Increased Ability Drain to AB25 in Desert Dunes * Increased Gold drops in Desert Dunes * Increased Ability Points in Unknown Depths Please keep sending in suggestions. All suggestions are read, but some may not get a response. Dark Ages Team
